articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Shares of Australian fast-food chain Guzman y Gomez soar 39% on trading debut - CNBC
articles.description: The company's IPO at AU$335.1 million is Australia's largest IPO since chemical distributor Redox's offering in July 2023.
articles.content:
Mexican-themed fast-food chain Guzman y Gomez made a stellar debut on the Australian Stock Exchange on Thursday, with its shares soaring as much as 39.1%.
The company, which was valued at 2.23 billi… [+937 chars]
